body_html: We were considering this long time ago as the first version of variable_scope. Then the reuse checks came and so on -- it basically evlolved into variable_scope. Currently, we recommend everyone to use variable_scope and not use name_scope except for internal code and libraries. Wouldn't just using variable_scope solve your problem?
